alert.note: Alert for Madison; Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 4:54PM EDT until September 07 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Madison County in central New York... Southeastern Onondaga County in central New York... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 453 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pompey, or 14 miles southeast of Syracuse, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sullivan, Oneida, Lenox, Pompey, Chittenango, Canastota, Manlius, Sherrill, Cazenovia, and Morrisville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
